abstract: Microsoft’s second-quarter results, which topped expectations, were robust, with help from the $150 add-on for its Xbox consoles, the Kinect.
snippet: Microsoft’s second-quarter results, which topped expectations, were robust, with help from the $150 add-on for its Xbox consoles, the Kinect.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft rode strong sales of its new Kinect game device and its mainstay software products to deliver robust quarterly profits and sales.

headline.main: Debut of Game Device and Strength in Business Sales Lift Microsoft
headline.print_headline: Debut of Game Device and Strength in Business Sales Lift Microsoft
